Term: The form of government in the U.S.
Oath of Allegiance to the United States
Definition: a promise to be loyal to the United States.

Term: Bear arms on behalf of the United States
Definition: to use a gun to defend the United States during a war.

Term: Perform work of national importance  under civilian direction
Definition: do non-military work during a national crisis.

Term: Example of work of national importance under civilian direction
Definition: helping the Red Cross after a natural disaster.
